<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82164</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82164</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4227</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Stretching Exercises for the PE Class</string>
            <string language="es">Ejercicios de estiramientos para la clase de Educación física (PE, Physical Education)</string>
            <string language="ga">Cleachtaí Sínidh don Rang Corpoideachais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausdehnen der Übungen für die PET Kategorie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étirage des exercices pour la classe de PE</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esticando exercícios para a classe do PE</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Allungamento delle esercitazioni per il codice 
categoria del PE</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τεντώνοντας ασκήσεις για την κλάση PE</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Information and illustrations emphasising the importance of including stretching exercises as an integral part of every PE lesson.</string>
            <string language="es">Información e ilustraciones que enfatizan la importancia de incluir ejercicios de estiramiento como parte integral de todas las lecciones de PE.</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolas agus léirithe a chuireann béim ar an tábhacht a bhaineann le cleachtaí sínidh a dhéanamh mar chuid lárnach de gach ceacht Corpoideachais.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Physical Education</string>
            <string language="es">Educación física. Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">Corpoideachas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Advice Sheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Billeog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationen und Abbildungen, die den Wert des 
Einschließens der ausdehnenden Übungen als wesentlicher Bestandteil 
jeder PET-Lektion hervorheben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'information et illustrations soulignant 
l'importance d'inclure des exercices s'étendants comme partie 
intégrale de chaque leçon de PE.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Informação e ilustrações que emfatizam a 
importância de incluir exercícios esticando como uma parte integral 
de cada lição do PE.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le informazioni ed illustrazioni che danno risalto
all'importanza di includere le esercitazioni d'allungamento come parte
integrante di ogni lezione del PE.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πληροφορίες και απεικονίσεις που υπογραμμίζουν τη 
σημασία τις τεντώνοντας ασκήσεις ως αναπόσπαστο τμήμα κάθε 
μαθήματος PE.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leibeserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rateblatt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuille de conseil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Do Conselho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio Di Consiglio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυσική αγωγή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο συμβουλών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
